alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 1:16AM CDT until August 09 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Northeastern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 200 AM CDT/100 AM MDT/. * At 116 AM CDT/1216 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lemoyne, or 15 miles north of Ogallala, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Big Bald Hill, Nevens, Broganville and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 93 and 114. Highway 92 between mile markers 127 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 135 and 142. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
